Text: Attn Mr Greg Whalleyforwarding this message that came to me and it is address for you Thanks Yoli Forwarded by Yorleni MendezCorpEnron on PM John Panaro on PM To cc Subject Attn Mr Greg Whalley DearMrWhalley International Investment Conferences Incorporated has been host to the worlds Natural Resource companies worldwide for the last years and we would like to extend an invitation to you and your group to sponsor and participate in our th anniversary event INVESTING IN THE AMERICAS This annual conferenceevent is being held at the Sheraton Bal Harbour Beach Resort in Bal Harbour Florida on April rd and th of and its focus is to unite the worlds resource explorationproduction companies with their respective Institutional Investors Fund Managers Brokers and Industry Analysts along with the Ministries of Mining and Energy of all the countries in Latin America and Canada This event is highly sophisticated and wellattended and ENRON would benefit greatly by sponsoring this th anniversary conference Please give me a call if you would and we can discuss the details by telephone My numbers are listed below and I would like to send an invitational package to you directly Sincerely John Panaro International Sales and Marketing Director International Investment Conferences Inc Ext Fax Email Websites wwwiiconfcom and wwwbzbzxpocom
